changeEmail.name: Change email address
changeEmail.description: You want to change your email address for your cape
changeEmail.title: How to change your email address
changeEmail.message:
To change your email address, please email **optifinex@gmail.com** from the original donation email mentioning that you want to change your email address. After that you will be asked to confirm the change.
Once the email is changed you will have 30 days to undo it. From then on it is permanently changed.

If you no longer have access to your donator email, please open a ticket using the `Other` category and provide a proof of purchase such as a PayPal Transaction ID.

If you have no email access or proof of purchace then unfortunately your email is stuck and nothing can be done.

fixEmail.name: Spelt email incorrectly
fixEmail.description: You made a mistake and spelt your email wrong when donating

modal.label: Your correctly spelt donation email address

nickChange.name: Cape disappeared after username change
nickChange.description: Your cape has disappeared after changing your username
nickChange.title: Why has your cape disappeared after you changed your username?
nickChange.message:
This is completely normal. Capes are based on your account username. After you change your name, it can take up to 24 hours for OptiFine to automatically move your cape over to your new username

If it has been longer than 24 hours and it still is not showing, you can try logging into [optifine.net](https://optifine.net/login) and moving your cape manually.
If your cape is still not showing, please open a ticket using the `Cape` category

badlionCaching.name: Badlion Client my cape is not updating
badlionCaching.description: I changed my cape design but it is not updating in game
badlionCaching.title: Badlion Client caches cape designs
badlionCaching.message:
Like the name suggests, Badlion Client is bad, and it takes ages for your cape design to update. There is nothing you can do, there is nothing we can do, you will just have to wait.

For some reason, Badlion Client caches OptiFine capes, which means they take ages for it to update. If you want your cape design to update faster, complain to the Badlion Client team about it.

thirdPartyClient.name: Cape issues while using 3rd Party Client
thirdPartyClient.description: You have a problem with your cape while using Badlion, Lunar Client, etc
thirdPartyClient.title: Third party clients are not supported
thirdPartyClient.message:
We cannot help you with problems while using 3rd party clients. Please check if the issue also occurs in the official Minecraft Launcher. If it does not, please go to the relevant clients support team.

If you are using Badlion and your cape texture is not updating, you just need to wait. This is a known issue with Badlion and it is just slow at updating capes.

cape.name: Cape
cape.description: Any other issues related to capes

payment.name: Payment
payment.description: Any issues related to payment issues
payment.title: Unable to provide support
payment.message: Unfortunately, we are unable to help with payment issues. Only Paymentwall can provide support for payment related issues. You can contact them at `support@paymentwall.com`

rp.name: Resource Packs
rp.description: Any issues related to resource packs
rp.title: Unable to provide support
rp.message: The support tickets are not for resource pack related issues. Please go to <#425702172219408385> for anything resource pack related.

ticketClose.name: My ticket was closed!
ticketClose.title: What to do if your ticket was falsely closed
ticketClose.message:
If a support ticket is inactive for a while, it will get automatically closed by Discord. If this occurs you can reopen the ticket by clicking the **#** symbol at the top of this channel, finding the ticket, and then sending a message in it.

If your ticket was closed by a support member because it cannot be resolved, do not reopen your ticket.

install.name: Installing OptiFine
install.description: You are unable to install OptiFine
install.title: How to install OptiFine
install.message:
**Installing for Windows**
To install OptiFine on Windows, please check [this FAQ entry](https://discord.com/channels/423430686880301056/531622141393764352/857742531558768650)

**Installing for MacOS**
To install OptiFine on MacOS, please check [this FAQ entry](https://discord.com/channels/423430686880301056/531622141393764352/869650598272831508)

Please make sure to read (and follow) all the steps from the FAQs. If you are still having issues installing OptiFine, please open a ticket using the `Other` category

moderator.name: Contact the moderators
moderator.description: You wish to contact the server moderators
moderator.title: How do I contact the server moderators?
moderator.message: Support tickets are not currently for moderation related stuff. For now, please either send a DM to a moderator, or trigger a `!modping` in the relevant channel. Moderator support will be coming to support tickets soon.
